title: Wrong Season Reward Border
body: Hello! I am a NA summoner and when I went into game for the first time today after the Preseason roll over I noticed that my border and reward Icon were for silver 1 when I'm a gold 3? Also I don't know if Victorious Sivir has been released yet but I think that ranked rewards don't fully roll out until the 17th? So I'm not sure whether or not my Sivir skin should have come yet or not. Regardless, I was hoping you guys could help me clear up this issue on my account!

replies.body: Are you seriously just coming to boards and opening thread before even looking at board? Rewards arent given out yet...
IIRC, they are being given out between now and the 17th.
That's spooky, I am also gold 3 with a silver 1 border from last year. But yeah, it's because they are still rolling out so it is just from last season until you get your rewards.

Hey Queen Quinn (how are you liking the changes, by the way?) - 

The rewards are still rolling out for end of season rewards. The rewards are rolling out in waves and all rewards should be distributed by the end of the day on November 18th. If you don't have the proper rewards yet, hang tight, they're on their way! ^-^

Hope this clears things up!

I haven't played yet, but was just curious if you were playing a normal 5s game? Or perhaps a teams game? I know after last season if I played ranked 3s I would have a silver border because my 3s team was silver. And if it was ranked 5s I would have no border because ranked 5s team was bronze. But norms just matched solo/duo que rank.
